column5: Our new Master’s degree in Artificial Intelligence (AI) is aimed at mathematically-minded STEM graduates.It delivers intensive training in programming and the fundamentals of artificial intelligence through a range of specialist modules.As well as learning the technical skills required for this rapidly growing area of computing science, you have the chance to explore realistic applications through group and individual projects. The Department has contacts with major technology companies, perfect for opportunities within industry-initiated projects.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
